abstract: An object you use to specify image URLs.
overview:
## Overview

In addition to using a dictionary object that defines image URLs for [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/ImageAnnotation] or [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/MarkerAnnotation], you can specify an image delegate that allows you to return a URL dynamically or asynchronously.

MapKit JS calls this method with a pixel ratio value that your function uses to construct a URL to an appropriately scaled image, and returns it as the first argument of the callback, as in the following example:

items.description: Returns the URL to an image of the specified scale.
items.name: getImageUrl(ratio, callback)

items.description: An object that defines a set of images URLs for different scales.
items.name: ImageHashObject

title: ImageDelegate
